FileFormat.FormatDescription: Imported from a Fido format_extensions.xml. Previous working ID: fmt/301

FidoSignature.FidoSignatureName: Computer Graphics Metafile (Clear Text) Version 3 No.1
FidoSignature.FidoSignatureNote: Element name begmf (Begin Metafile) with any letter in the element name in upper or lower case, followed by any number of bytes, followed by version (MFVERSION{1}3 or mfversion{1}3, or any upper/lower case combination). Trailer endmf{0-1}; (with any letter in the element name in upper or lower case) that can be followed by a comment
